column1: International Social and Public Policy MSc
column2: London School of Economics and Political Science
column5: Ask LSE The ISPP programme addresses how states and societies respond to global challenges of social, demographic and economic change, and of poverty, migration and globalisation. It is underpinned by the LSE approach to social and public policy which is explicitly international, interdisciplinary and applied.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
